titleStmt.title: Englands bane: or, The description of drunkennesse. Composed and written by Thomas Young, sometimes student of Staple-Inne
titleStmt.author: Young, Thomas, student of Staple Inn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, and are to be sold by Thomas Baylee, at the corner shop in the middle rowe in Holborne, neere adioyning vnto Staple Inne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Title page, A2-3 cropped at head.

place.placeName: the corner shop in the middle rowe in Holborne, neere adioyning vnto Staple Inne
